introduction: SYNOPSISSusie, a writer, comes to Guam to divorce her husband whom she has been separated from. She is personally welcomed to Guam by Peter Park. He pretends to care for her expecting a huge amount of consolation money she is to receive from millionaire Howard Kang. When Howard refuses to sign the papers, Peter buys Dong-cheol off to conspire together. When his scheme does not work, he orders him to kill Howard Kang. Dong-cheol fails to kill Howard and in turn Howard takes Dong-cheol to Peter's office. He finds out the truth and finds his wife Susie as she waits to meet Peter. He tells her the truth and they patch things up and return to Seoul together.故事报告文学作家树脂来关岛离婚和分居是她的丈夫。她到达了在关岛接受彼得公园的热情好客，他假装爱她，因为树脂是大亨霍华德·里弗斯离婚期间收到赡养费的数额巨大。让河流和霍华德不想离婚地块贿赂彼得·多丘尔·朴。该方法也无济于事eopja命令杀死霍华德河。霍华德最终学会全部由冰爪的河里发现的事实apsewoogo河未能杀死彼得·霍华德公园办公室，会见了树脂在酒店等待见面的前一夜，彼得说，事故的严重程度。霍华德和河流树脂谈到回首尔。
